text: Dong Hewei is a visually impaired Paralympian athlete from China competing mainly in T11 classification sprint and long jump events. Zhou won two medals at her first Summer Paralympics, the 2012 London Games, in the women's 200m sprint (bronze) and the long jump (silver). Jia is also a World Championships and Asian Games medalists, winning seven medals over five tournaments. ==Notes== Category:Chinese female triple jumpers Category:Paralympic athletes of China Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for China Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from Hangzhou Category:Athletes from Zhejiang Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Dong Hewei
